verses.verse: Remind <S%G5279><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to be <S%G5279><s%> in subjection to <S%G5293><s%> rulers <S%G5293><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to authorities, <S%G1849><s%> to be obedient, <S%G3980><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%>

to speak evil <S%G987><s%> of no one, <S%G3367><s%> not to be <S%G1511><s%> contentious, <S%G269><s%> to be gentle, <S%G1933><s%> showing <S%G1731><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> humility <S%G4236><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> were <S%G1510><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> once <S%G4218><s%> foolish, <S%G453><s%> disobedient, <S%G545><s%> deceived, <S%G4105><s%> serving <S%G1398><s%> various <S%G4164><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pleasures, <S%G2237><s%> living <S%G1236><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> malice <S%G2549><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> envy, <S%G5355><s%> hateful, <S%G4767><s%> and hating <S%G3404><s%> one another. <S%G240><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the kindness <S%G5544><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Savior <S%G4990><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his love <S%G5363><s%> toward mankind <S%G5363><s%> appeared, <S%G2014><s%>

not <S%G3756><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> ourselves, <S%G235><s%> but according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> he saved <S%G4982><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the washing <S%G3067><s%> of regeneration <S%G3824><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> renewing <S%G342><s%> by the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%>

whom <S%G3739><s%> he poured <S%G1632><s%> out on <S%G1909><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> richly, <S%G4146><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Savior; <S%G4990><s%>

that, <S%G2443><s%> being justified <S%G1344><s%> by his <S%G1565><s%> grace, <S%G5485><s%> we might be made <S%G1096><s%> heirs <S%G2818><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

This saying <S%G3056><s%> is faithful, <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> concerning these things <S%G5130><s%> I desire <S%G1014><s%> that <S%G1226><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> affirm confidently, <S%G1226><s%> so that <S%G2443><s%> those who have believed <S%G4100><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> may be careful <S%G5431><s%> to maintain <S%G4291><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%> These things <S%G5023><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> profitable <S%G5624><s%> to men; <S%G444><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> shun <S%G4026><s%> foolish <S%G3474><s%> questionings, <S%G2214><s%> <S%G2532><s%> genealogies, <S%G1076><s%> <S%G2532><s%> strife, <S%G2054><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> disputes <S%G3163><s%> about the law; <S%G3544><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> unprofitable <S%G512><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> vain. <S%G3152><s%>
Avoid <S%G3868><s%> a factious <S%G141><s%> man <S%G444><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> a first <S%G1520><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> second <S%G1208><s%> warning; <S%G3559><s%>
knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a one is perverted, <S%G1612><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sins, <S%G264><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> self-condemned. <S%G843><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> I send <S%G3992><s%> Artemas <S%G734><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> Tychicus, <S%G5190><s%> be diligent <S%G4704><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Nicopolis, <S%G3533><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I have determined <S%G2919><s%> to winter <S%G3914><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>

Send <S%G4311><s%> Zenas, <S%G2211><s%> the lawyer, <S%G3544><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> on their journey <S%G4311><s%> speedily, <S%G4709><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> may be lacking <S%G3007><s%> for them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Let <S%G3129><s%> our people <S%G2251><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> to maintain <S%G4291><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> necessary <S%G316><s%> uses, <S%G5532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may not <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

All who are <S%G3956><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you. <S%G4571><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> those who love <S%G5368><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
